name: Comic Library Utilities (CLU)
description: Comic Library Utilities (CLU) is a powerful, standalone web-based utility designed to help users manage, edit, and maintain their digital comic libraries of any size. Originally developed as an accessory to Komga, CLU has evolved into a comprehensive tool for remote comic collection management. Features include bulk file operations (rename, convert, rebuild, enhance), CBZ/CBR editing with a full graphical interface, image cropping and enhancement, remote downloads from GetComics.org/Pixeldrain/Mega with Chrome extension support, folder monitoring with auto-renaming and conversion, file browser with drag-and-drop support, ComicInfo.xml editing, GCD (Grand Comics Database) metadata integration, and OPDS support. Perfect for managing large comic collections without direct server access.
author: allaboutduncan
